languages.text: "Мы — наследники, имеющие полное право называть первозданный мир своим. Однако наше прибытие — трагедия, а не возвращение в родные земли". {n}В голосе Ирлиэт сквозит горечь.{/n} "Мы принадлежим... принадлежали {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}миру-кораблю{/g} Крударах, что пал на границе этого звездного региона. Лишь провидение милосердных богов позволило нам избежать участи тех, чьи души сгинули среди звездной пыли вместе с нашей обителью".

"We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."
languages.original_text: "Мы — наследники, имеющие полное право называть первозданный мир своим. Однако наше прибытие — трагедия, а не возвращение в родные земли". {n}В голосе Ирлиэт сквозит горечь.{/n} "Мы принадлежим... принадлежали {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}миру-кораблю{/g} Крударах, что пал на границе этого звездного региона. Лишь провидение милосердных богов позволило нам избежать участи тех, чьи души сгинули среди звездной пыли вместе с нашей обителью".

traits.locale_text: "We are the heirs of the Aeldari, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to Craftworld Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

"We are the heirs of the Aeldari, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to Craftworld Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

"We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

languages.text: 「私たちは後継者にして、メイデンワールドの所有者を名乗る資格は十二分にある。しかし、私たちがたどり着いたのは悲劇だ、帰郷ではない」{n}ユリエットの声には哀しみが漂っている。{/n}「私達は…{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}、クルダラの所属だ。その方舟はこの星の境界に堕ちた。住処とともに死んだ魂がありながら、星屑に囲まれた空間で、私たちだけが生き延びた。慈悲深き神の御心によって運命を免れたのだ」
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは後継者にして、メイデンワールドの所有者を名乗る資格は十二分にある。しかし、私たちがたどり着いたのは悲劇だ、帰郷ではない」{n}ユリエットの声には哀しみが漂っている。{/n}「私達は…{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟{/g}、クルダラの所属だ。その方舟はこの星の境界に堕ちた。住処とともに死んだ魂がありながら、星屑に囲まれた空間で、私たちだけが生き延びた。慈悲深き神の御心によって運命を免れたのだ」

languages.text: “我们是祖先的子嗣，完全有权利将莉莱赞视为我们自己的领地。然而，我们的到来却缘于一场悲剧，而非回乡的喜悦。”{n}伊莉耶特声音中流露出了悲伤之意。{/n}“我们来自……{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}克鲁达拉赫，它坠落在了这片行星区域边界。我们同胞的灵魂与我们的居所一起消逝在了星尘之中，感谢仁慈诸神的旨意，让我们逃脱了命运的魔爪。”
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

traits.locale_text: “我们是祖先的子嗣，完全有权利将莉莱赞视为我们自己的领地。然而，我们的到来却缘于一场悲剧，而非回乡的喜悦。”{n}伊莉耶特声音中流露出了悲伤之意。{/n}“我们来自……{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}方舟世界{/g}克鲁达拉赫，它坠落在了这片行星区域边界。我们同胞的灵魂与我们的居所一起消逝在了星尘之中，感谢仁慈诸神的旨意，让我们逃脱了命运的魔爪。”

languages.text: «Somos sus herederos, y tenemos el legítimo derecho de reclamar este mundo virgen como nuestro. Pese a ello, nuestra llegada no supone una vuelta al hogar, sino una tragedia». {n}La voz de Yrliet se atenúa por la pena.{/n} «Nuestro sitio está... estaba en el {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} Crudarach, que sucumbió en las fronteras de esta región estelar. Solo la providencia de los dioses misericordiosos nos permitió escapar al destino sufrido por las almas que perecieron entre el polvo de estrellas junto con nuestra morada».
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

traits.locale_text: «Somos sus herederos, y tenemos el legítimo derecho de reclamar este mundo virgen como nuestro. Pese a ello, nuestra llegada no supone una vuelta al hogar, sino una tragedia». {n}La voz de Yrliet se atenúa por la pena.{/n} «Nuestro sitio está... estaba en el {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}mundo astronave{/g} Crudarach, que sucumbió en las fronteras de esta región estelar. Solo la providencia de los dioses misericordiosos nos permitió escapar al destino sufrido por las almas que perecieron entre el polvo de estrellas junto con nuestra morada».

languages.text: "Wir sind die Erben, und es ist unser Recht, die Jungfernwelt als unser Eigentum zu bezeichnen. Allerdings war unsere Ankunft eine Tragödie, keine Heimkehr." {n}Traurigkeit schleicht sich in Yrliets Stimme.{/n} "Wir gehören ... gehörten zum {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} Crudarach, das an der Grenze dieser Sternenregion unterging. Nur die Vorsehung der gnädigen Götter ermöglichte uns, dem Schicksal zu entgehen, das alle heimsuchte, deren Seelen zusammen mit unserer Heimstatt im Sternenstaub vergingen."
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind die Erben, und es ist unser Recht, die Jungfernwelt als unser Eigentum zu bezeichnen. Allerdings war unsere Ankunft eine Tragödie, keine Heimkehr." {n}Traurigkeit schleicht sich in Yrliets Stimme.{/n} "Wir gehören ... gehörten zum {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Weltenschiff{/g} Crudarach, das an der Grenze dieser Sternenregion unterging. Nur die Vorsehung der gnädigen Götter ermöglichte uns, dem Schicksal zu entgehen, das alle heimsuchte, deren Seelen zusammen mit unserer Heimstatt im Sternenstaub vergingen."

languages.text: « En tant qu'héritiers, nous sommes parfaitement en droit de revendiquer ce monde vierge. Malheureusement, notre arrivée n'est pas un retour aux sources, mais une tragédie, {n}explique Yrliet d'une voix empreinte de chagrin.{/n} Nous appartenons... ou appartenions au {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} Crudarach, qui a été détruit à la frontière de cette région stellaire. Si nous avons pu échapper au sort subi par ceux dont l'âme s'est envolée dans la poussière d'étoiles avec notre foyer, c'est uniquement grâce à la providence et à la miséricorde des dieux. »
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."

traits.locale_text: « En tant qu'héritiers, nous sommes parfaitement en droit de revendiquer ce monde vierge. Malheureusement, notre arrivée n'est pas un retour aux sources, mais une tragédie, {n}explique Yrliet d'une voix empreinte de chagrin.{/n} Nous appartenons... ou appartenions au {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}vaisseau-monde{/g} Crudarach, qui a été détruit à la frontière de cette région stellaire. Si nous avons pu échapper au sort subi par ceux dont l'âme s'est envolée dans la poussière d'étoiles avec notre foyer, c'est uniquement grâce à la providence et à la miséricorde des dieux. »

languages.text: "Bizler vârisleriz, Bakir Dünya'yı kendimize ait görmek de pek tabii hakkımız. Lakin gelişimiz kasıtlı değil, bir badire eseri oldu." {n}Yrliet'in sesine keder doluyor.{/n} "Biz... Bu yıldız bölgesi civarına düşen {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Gemidünya{/g} Crudarach'ta yaşıyorduk. Ruhları yuvamızla birlikte yıldız tozuna karışanların kaderine ortak olmaktan merhametli tanrıların takdiri kurtardı bizi."
languages.original_text: "We are the heirs, and we are entirely within our rights to call the Maiden World our own. However, our arrival is a tragedy, not a homecoming." {n}Sorrow seeps into Yrliet's voice.{/n} "We belong... belonged to {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Craftworld{/g} Crudarach, which fell on the border of this star region. Only the providence of the merciful gods allowed us to escape the fate that befell those whose souls perished amidst the stardust along with our abode."
